title: Three models of Pixel Watch get Bluetooth certification, moving closer to release
content:
Google’s Pixel Watch is moving one step closer to release today, as three models of the smartwatch have gotten approval from the Bluetooth Special Interest Group (SIG).

more…

The post Three models of Pixel Watch get Bluetooth certification, moving closer to release appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google's Pixel Watch is one step closer to release, as three models of the smartwatch have gotten approval from the Bluetooth SIG.
